p: The study determined whether patients experienced any side effects of INH such as numbness, tingling and burning sensation, blurred or loss of vision, convulsions, mood changes, unusual bleeding, skin rash, sore throat, joint pain, fever, dizziness, loss of appetite, nausea and vomiting, and dark urine. Results in TableÂ 2 shows that only 4% of patients reported a side effect associated with INH.
